product_name: Shebeest Shindigger Bike Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: Eliminate the need for uncomfortable knee warmers with these flattering and functional Shebeest Shindigger bike capris. DriStyle(TM) fabric offers built-in temperature regulation, preventing you from heating up or cooling down too fast. DriStyle fabric has a unique micro-channeled midweight construction with a soft, weightless feel. SheLastic(TM) chamois has 4-way stretch, ergonomic shape and seamless construction. 8-panel construction with flatlock seams reduces abrasion, bolsters muscle support and ensures a streamlined look and feel. Wide waistband reduces rolling and provides superior comfort when you're aerodynamically positioned on the bike. Shebeest signature grippers keep leg hems in place. Machine washable.
short_description: Eliminate the need for uncomfortable knee warmers with these flattering and functional Shebeest Shindigger bike capris.
